description:
When you need a bit more power on your next outdoor journey, it’s our men’s Stretch Zion AT Pant to the rescue. We took the durability of our standard ReZion™ fabric, and boosted it with extra stretch, weight, and warmth. This souped-up style is perfect for cool-weather hikes or even multi-day expeditions into higher altitudes.

And in case you’re new to ReZion™: it’s the Earth-friendly evolution of our bestselling performance fabric… allowing you to adventure confidently knowing there are over two decades of tried and trusted durability backing you up.
name: Prana Stretch Zion AT Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
